description: Slim fit. Stretchy. And soft-brushed Merino next to skin. Our Men’s Active Fleece Tech Pant is everything you’d want on colder adventures. Adjustable at the waist and legs for maximum comfort every way you move, plus recycled synthetic material that is designed to protect against the elements and zippered hand pockets. Reflective elements along the pant aid visibility in low-light conditions, or whenever you’re finally ready to call it for the day.
name: Smartwool Active Fleece Tech Pants - Mens
